scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run browserify
scripts.predataplayer: json -I -f ./apps/settings.json -e "{this.dataplayer={fileprefix: \"`npm config get dataFilename | xargs -I{} basename {} .json`\"}}"
scripts.createstudy: ./apps/scripts/createstudy.js | tail -1 | xargs -I{} npm config set studyID {}
scripts.precreatestudy: mkdirp ./apps/data/studies && npm config delete studyID && npm config delete dataFilename
scripts.cpmostrecent: ./apps/scripts/cpmostrecent.sh | tail -1 | xargs -I{} npm config set dataFilename {}
scripts.createcorrections: ./apps/scripts/createcorrections.js "`npm config get studyID`" "`npm config get dataFilename`" | xargs -I{} npm config set correctionsID {}
